name: Moon-bridge
description:
Game made in 1 week for Jame gam #10.

Try to go up and up and up... but  be careful! it's going to be hard. You have a jump Booster to use, but only one time!

-Theme: one use

-Special feature: unstable bridges

Movement:

 Up arrow= Jump

 Left arrow= Move left

 Right arrow= Move right
